Class MinimaxAI

  • java.lang.Object
    • AI
      • MinimaxAI

  • public class MinimaxAI
extends AI
    This class implements a computer player that plays board games by using the minimax algorithm to 'minimize the maximum possible loss' of the player. This implementation of the minimax algorithm is based on the following references: "Data structures and algorithms - Game trees, alpha-beta search" http://www.cs.mcgill.ca/~cs251/OldCourses/1997/topic11/z "AI Horizon: MinimaxPlayer game tree programming" http://www.aihorizon.com/essays/basiccs/trees/minimax2.htm Pseudocode for alpha-beta pruning in conjunction with minimax http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alpha-beta_pruning#Pseudocode
